akn:section.akn:heading: Transportation research and development 5-year strategic plan

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Not later than 180 days after the date of publication of the Department of Transportation Strategic Plan and not less frequently than once every 5 years thereafter, the Secretary shall develop a 5-year transportation research and development strategic plan to guide future Federal transportation research and development activities.
